sentences.en: Bevin is now an adult and has re-lived her birth experience under hypnosis.
sentences.cn: 贝文现在是个成年人了，她在催眠状态下重温了自己的出生过程。

sentences.en: Bevin is now an adult and has relived her birth experience under hypnosis.
sentences.cn: 贝文现在是个成年人了，她在催眠状态下重温了自己的出生过程。

sentences.en: Conclusion: It has the effects of sedation, hypnosis and strengthening immune function.
sentences.cn: 结论: 灵芝颗粒剂具有镇静催眠、强免疫功能的作用.

sentences.en: He is a good subject for research into hypnosis.
sentences.cn: 他很适合做催眠术研究的受试对象.

sentences.en: He uses hypnosis as part of the treatment.
sentences.cn: 他用催眠术作为治疗的一部份。

sentences.en: I decided to put him under hypnosis and ask him again.
sentences.cn: 我决定先让他进入催眠状态,然后再问他一次.

sentences.en: ObjectiveTo study the effect of Cortex Albiziae solution pentobarbital - induced hypnosis in mice.
sentences.cn: 目的考察合欢皮水煎剂对戊巴比妥钠诱导小白鼠产生催眠作用的量效关系.

sentences.en: Patients under hypnosis pass into a trance - like state.
sentences.cn: 被催眠的病人逐渐进入昏睡状态.

sentences.en: She is a good subject for treatment by hypnosis.
sentences.cn: 她很适合做催眠治疗法的受试对象.

sentences.en: She only remembered details of the accident under hypnosis .
sentences.cn: 她只有在催眠状态下才能记起那次事故的细节。

sentences.en: The most important factor in hypnosis is suggestibility.
sentences.cn: 催眠术中最重要的因素是暗示感应性.

sentences.en: The story of Edgar Cayce properly belongs in the history of hypnosis.
sentences.cn: 埃德加·凯西的故事应载入催眠史.

sentences.en: This is the hypnosis technic which can help self - healing.
sentences.cn: ;以下是一段催眠的技巧可以被用来帮助 自我 医治.

sentences.en: Unaware hypnosis is CLEARLY electronic harassment in the EXTREME!
sentences.cn: 无法察觉的催眠显然是电子折磨的极致!

trans.tran_en: a state similar to sleep, in which someone’s thoughts and actions can be influenced by someone else
